### Welcome!

I am a broadly trained ecologist and science communicator focused on leveraging spatial data science to advance conservation and management efforts. Some of my recent projects and experiences are highlighted on this website. Feel free to explore and get in touch!

### Professional Interests

Landscape ecology | Fire ecology | Geographic Information Systems | Remote Sensing | Climate Resiliency | Habitat Restoration | Collaborative Stewardship
